transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: L-Leave It To Me
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest attack if the target's Max Health is lower than the caster's Max Health.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000088_1_2]</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest attack if the target's Max Health is lower than the caster's Max Health.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Come Here, Hound
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) Unaffected by Stunned. Reduces damage taken by allies from attacks that target all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> and <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of damage dealt to allies is redirected to the caster. (Only the effect with the highest value is applied.)

(Triggered Effect) After being hit, uses <color=#28d9ed>Come Here, Hound</color> on the enemy with the lowest Max Health. Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed> 1 turn(s)</color>.
This skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description:
(Passive Effect) Unaffected by Stunned. Reduces damage taken by allies from attacks that target all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000088_2_1]</color> and <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000088_2_2]</color> of damage dealt to allies is redirected to the caster. (Only the effect with the highest value is applied.)

(Triggered Effect) After being hit, uses <color=#28d9ed>Come Here, Hound</color> on the enemy with the lowest Max Health. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000088_2_4]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed> [Buff_T_2000088_2_4] turn(s)</color>.
This skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: For Pandemonium!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Reduces the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> granted to the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>, then attacks the enemy.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description: Reduces the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> granted to the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>, then attacks the enemy.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased Effectiveness to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000088_chain_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased Effectiveness to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000088_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
